cottie.name: Cottie
cottie.2pc: Gains 20% more Energy when pinging an orb. Signature Move requires 20% less Energy.
cottie.4pc: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% for 10s when performing a Signature Move. Gains Super Armor that increases Extra DMG Reduction by 20% for 5s after the Signature Move. Both duration will reset every time it is triggered.

edison.name: Edison
edison.2pc: Signal Orb skill DMG increases by 5%.
edison.4pc: After a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

aife.name: Aife
aife.2pc: For each orb pinged, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

ike.name: Ike
ike.2pc: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% and Elemental DMG increases by 4%.
ike.4pc: When dealing Elemental DMG, you have a 15% chance to inflict Burn, Electrocute, Frost, and Corruption depending on the element. Lasts 5 seconds and has 8 second cooldown on the same unit.

einsteina.name: Einsteina
einsteina.2pc: QTE and 3-Ping skills reduce the target's corresponding Elemental Resistance by 15% for 8s. 10s cooldown.
einsteina.4pc: When taking damage, releases an elemental aura, gaining Elemental Resistance equal to 5% + 1% of own DEF for 5s. Elemental DMG dealt increases by 15% when the aura is present. 8s cooldown.
note: When taking damage, releases an elemental aura, gaining 20% Elemental Resistance against all elements for 5s. Elemental DMG dealt increases by 15% when the aura is present. 8s cooldown.

archimedes.name: Archimedes
archimedes.2pc: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5%.
archimedes.4pc: In every 10s, the next Basic Attack increases Basic Attack DMG by 10% for 4s.

alice.name: Alice
alice.4pc: Healing increases the target's Physical DMG and Elemental DMG by 4% for 4s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

patton.name: Patton
patton.2pc: CRIT Rate and Physical DMG increase by 5%.
patton.4pc: Each time you deal Physical DMG, if it is not a CRIT Hit, the CRIT Rate of the next Physical DMG increases by 2%, stacking up to a maximum of 20%. This effect is reset when you deal a CRIT Hit. CRIT Hit increases Physical DMG by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
note: ATK increases by 3%. Physical DMG increases by 7%.

Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Attacking a target inflicts them with Laceration, which decreases the target's Physical Resistance by 7%. Laceration lasts for 8s and has a 10s cooldown against the same target. Attacking a target inflicted with Laceration causes an explosion that deals 600% Physical DMG. This effect has a 6s cooldown against the same target.

bianca: tipsy night.name: Bianca: Tipsy Night
bianca: tipsy night.4pc: After a 3-Ping, DEF increases by 10% for 5s.

isabel.name: Isabel
isabel.2pc: ATK increases by 5% and Ice DMG increases by 7%.
isabel.4pc: Frost-Treated Blade: Quench deals 15% more Base DMG.
isabel.6pc: Bitter Frost deals 200% more Ice DMG to enemies with Frozen Status.

kuriko eternal.name: Kuriko Eternal
kuriko eternal.2pc: When attacking, has a 20% chance to call an artillery strike, each shell dealing 40% Physical DMG to the target. 15s cooldown.

boone.name: Boone
boone.4pc: Doubles the Base DMG increase effect of Karenina: Scire's Kinetic Energy for Starshatter Horizon and the Base DMG multiplier of Leap Attack and Radiant Whirlwind.

darwin.name: Darwin
darwin.2pc: For every orb pinged, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
darwin.4pc: Records the color of Signal Orbs pinged. When all 3 colors is recorded, unleashes a 12m shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the record.

da vinci.name: Da Vinci
da vinci.2pc: When QTE is triggered, the controlling character gains 10% ATK and 20% DEF for 8s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
da vinci.4pc: When QTE is triggered, triggers another character's QTE. 8s cooldown. If there are 3 characters on the field, ATK is increased by 20%.
note: When QTE is triggered, triggers another character's QTE. 8s cooldown. If there are 3 characters on the field, ATK is increased by 20% for 2s.

derketo.name: Derketo
derketo.4pc: Base DMG of Torrent Orbs, Tidal Orbs, and Signature - Sunken Finale increases by 100%. After casting Signature - Sunken Finale, if Lamia is switched out of battle, she will still cast co-attacks when any teammate actively casts their Signature. Co-attacks deal 3000% Dark DMG each time, and can be triggered up to 3 times after every Signature - Sunken Finale.

diesel.name: Diesel
diesel.4pc: The efficiency of acquiring Blade Aura increases by 50%. The Base DMG of Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust increases by 50%, and the Base DMG of Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno increases by 80%.

lucia - summer daze.name: Lucia - Summer Daze
lucia - summer daze.4pc: After any 3-Ping, randomly gain one of the below effects for 3s. 4s cooldown. Wild Rocker: All DMG increases by 7%. Soothing Chord: Receives a shield equal to 15% of your Defense. The shield refreshes when this effect is triggered again.

seraphine.name: Seraphine
seraphine.2pc: ATK increases by 5% and Dark DMG increases by 5%.
seraphine.4pc: A random Reprise deals 100% more damage. Allies healed by Selena: Capriccio gain a Dark Radiation effect of dealing 10% more Dark DMG for 8s. The duration will be reset every time the effect is triggered.

philip.name: Philip II
philip.2pc: Healing effect increases by 10%. Healing ally units will increase their Physical DMG by 10% and DEF by 10% for 5s. 8s cooldown.
philip.4pc: A healing drone will be charged when healing is performed. When fully charged, the next time you performing healing will consume all charged energy to summon the healing drone. It will follow an ally with the lowest HP percentage, healing allies in a 5m radius for 2% maximum HP per second and increasing their Physical DMG by 15% for 5s. 12s cooldown.

frederick.name: Frederick
frederick.2pc: Each dodge increases Movement Speed by 15% and Extra DMG Bonus by 5% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
frederick.4pc: When the character triggers Matrix, all enemies' speed decreases by 20% and their Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 15% for 4s. 8s cooldown.

voltaire.name: Voltaire
voltaire.2pc: Attacks reduce the target's DEF by 10% for 5s. 12s cooldown.
voltaire.4pc: When taking damage, reduces the attacker's Physical DEF by 15% for 7s. Can be stacked up to 2 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

condelina.name: Condelina
condelina.2pc: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%.
condelina.4pc: Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to go berserk, increasing the Extra Damage of Basic Attack by 15% and CRIT Rate by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown.
note: Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to go berserk, increasing the Extra Damage Bonus of Basic Attack by 20% for 5s. 8s cooldown.

shakespeare.name: Shakespeare
shakespeare.2pc: All ATK increases by 3% and Fire DMG increases by 7%.
shakespeare.4pc: Attacks have a 50% chance to inflict Burn for 5s. When attacking a burning enemy, there is a 20% chance to cause an explosion, dealing 100% Fire DMG. 5s cooldown. Burn: Reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 8% and deals 12% Fire DMG per second. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
note: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Attacking a target inflicts them with Burn, which decreases the target's Fire Resistance by 15%. Burn lasts for 8s and has a 10s cooldown against the same target. Attacking a target inflicted with Burn causes an explosion that deals 600% Fire DMG. This effect has a 6s cooldown against the same target.

heisen.name: Heisen
heisen.2pc: All ATK increases by 3% and Lightning DMG increases by 7%.
heisen.4pc: Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger Thunderstorm within 3.5m. Thunderstorm electrocutes the target for 5s. 5s cooldown. Attacking an electrocuted enemy has a 20% chance to trigger lightning chain damage. 8s cooldown. Lightning Chain: All electrocuted targets take 250% Lightning DMG. Thunderstorm: 100% Lightning DMG. Electrocute: Lightning Resistance is reduced by 8%.
note: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Attacking a target inflicts them with Electrocute, which decreases the target's Lightning Resistance by 15%. Electrocute lasts for 8s and has a 10s cooldown against the same target. Attacking a target inflicted with Electrocute causes a thunderstorm that deals 600% Lightning DMG. This effect has a 6s cooldown against the same target.

hanna.name: Hanna
hanna.2pc: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping skills increases by 25%.
hanna.4pc: For every 30s, enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains a random Signal Orb.

catherine.name: Catherine
catherine.2pc: QTE and 3-Ping skills reduce the target's Physical DEF by 20% for 8s. 10s cooldown.
catherine.4pc: When taking damage, gains a shield that absorbs damage equal to 20% of own DEF, as well as increasing the Physical DMG dealt by 15% for 5s. 8s cooldown.
note: When taking damage, gains a shield worth 1,000 HP and increases Physical DMG of self by 15% for 5s. 8s cooldown.

guinevere.name: Guinevere
guinevere.2pc: Heals for 10% more. Increases the Elemental DMG and Resistances of the healing target by 10% for 5s. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds.
guinevere.4pc: A healing drone will be charged when healing is performed. When fully charged, the next time you performing healing will consume all charged energy to summon the healing drone. It will follow an ally with the lowest HP percentage, healing allies in a 5m radius for 2% maximum HP per second and increasing their Elemental ATK by 15% for 5s. 12s cooldown.

bathlon.name: Bathlon
bathlon.2pc: ATK increases by 3% and Dark DMG increases by 7%.
bathlon.4pc: Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to summon a Dark Zone that lasts 5s. 5s cooldown. The Dark Zone will inflict Corruption on the targets within it for 3s. Attacking a Corrupted target has a 20% chance to gain 1 random Signal Orb. 12s cooldown. Corruption: Deals 80% Dark DMG for every 2s and reduces Dark Resistance by 8%.
note: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Attacking a target inflicts them with Corruption, which decreases the target's Dark Resistance by 15%. Corruption lasts for 8s and has a 10s cooldown against the same target. Attacking a target inflicted with Corruption causes an explosion that deals 600% Dark DMG. This effect has a 6s cooldown against the same target.

chen jiyuan.name: Chen Jiyuan
chen jiyuan.2pc: ATK increases by 3% and Ice DMG increases by 7%.
chen jiyuan.4pc: 30% chance to cause Frost for 5s while attacking. When attacking targets with Frost, there is a 20% chance to trigger Ice Explosion to deal 420% Ice DMG within 3m from the target and apply Frost. This effect has a 8s cooldown. Frost: Reduces target's Movement Speed by 20% and Ice Resistance by 8%.
note: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Attacking a target inflicts them with Frost, which decreases the target's Ice Resistance by 15%. Frost lasts for 8s and has a 10s cooldown against the same target. Attacking a target inflicted with Frost causes Ice Explosion that deals 600% Ice DMG. This effect has a 6s cooldown against the same target.

leeuwenhoek.name: Leeuwenhoek
leeuwenhoek.2pc: ATK increases by 3% and Physical DMG increases by 7%.
leeuwenhoek.4pc: Increases the effect of Lance of Perception by 20%. Deals 5% more damage against targets under the effect of Lance of Perception.

flamel.name: Flamel
flamel.2pc: Dark DMG increases by 5% and ATK increases by 5%.
flamel.4pc: After entering Annihilation State, apothoic DMG increases by 30%. DMG of Finale Descends increases by 30%. Gain extra 10 Energy after pinging an Annihilation Orb.

tifa.name: Tifa
tifa.2pc: ATK increases by 5% and Lightning DMG increases by 5%.
tifa.4pc: DMG from Spear Lunge increases by 50%. Victorious War Flag causes Turbulence Interference on the target for 2s. Refreshes every time it is triggered. Basic DMG from Lightning Fall increases by 100%.

elizabeth.name: Elizabeth
elizabeth.2pc: ATK increases by 5% and Fire DMG increases by 5%.
elizabeth.4pc: Extra DMG Bonus of Oaths will increase by 50%. When equipped by Liv: Empyrea, upon a 3-Ping by any team member, Liv: Empyrea's drones will appear and cast White Oath against the target, dealing damage equal to 3% Liv: Empyrea's ATK every second for 20s. This effect can be stacked up to 5 times. Meanwhile, Liv: Empyrea will restore HP equal to 15% of her ATK every second for team members within the range for 4s.

unimate.name: Unimate
unimate.4pc: "Oops! Missed it!"/"Perfect!"/Burning Blow deals 100% more Base DMG. Nanami: Starfarer's QTE Skill will inflict Scorching Invasion that reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 15% upon hitting it for 8s.

charlotte.name: Charlotte
charlotte.2pc: Basic Attacks deal 5% more DMG. ATK increases by 7%.
charlotte.4pc: Glowing Lanternlight deals 50% more Base DMG. Afterglow Shadow deals 100% more Base DMG. Every time upon entering Luminous Realm, rearranges the Signal Orbs when casting Glowing Lanternlight.

turing.name: Turing
turing.4pc: Hypermatrix Strike and Signature - Collapsing Realm's Base DMG increases by 100%. Casting Hypermatrix Strike in Hypermatrix increases the duration of Hypermatrix by 1s.

aline.name: Aline
aline.2pc: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5% and Ice DMG increases by 5%.
aline.4pc: Base DMG of Pure Color: Theme Emphasis and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts increases by 50%. Base DMG of Vibrant Brushstroke increases by 80%.

fran.name: Fran
fran.2pc: Lightning DMG increases by 5%, Extra DMG bonus increases by 5%.
fran.4pc: Dusk Fluorescence and Forest Predator's Base DMG increases by 100%. Wolfspirit Release's Base DMG increases by 70%.

signa.name: Signa
signa.2pc: Physical DMG increases by 5% and Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5%.
signa.4pc: Base DMG of Imprisoning Co-Strike and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 100%. Allies healed by Echo gain an extra 20% CRIT DMG and 75% CRIT Rate for 8s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

alphonse.name: Alphonse
alphonse.4pc: Base DMG of Infernal Eruption and Thermal Erosion increases by 100%. Enemies hit by Searing Bulwark are inflicted with Scorching Invasion that reduces the target's Fire Resistance for 8s. Repeatedly triggering the effect refreshes its duration.

ji bo'an.name: Ji Bo'an
ji bo'an.2pc: ATK increases by 5%. Ice DMG increases by 5%.
ji bo'an.4pc: Base multiplier of Rimy Valediction, Fleeting Frost, and Tor Invocation increases by 100%. Skill multiplier of Ascended Sovereign, Quell Their Spirits doubles.

cleopatra.name: Cleopatra
cleopatra.4pc: The obtain rate of Apocalyptic Moonlight increases by 100%. During Main Sequence / Parousía Télous, Luna: Oblivion gains 30% Extra DMG Bonus.

changwuzi.name: changwuzi
changwuzi.4pc: Base DMG of Harmonics Orb increases by 100%. Piercing Strike effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by 20%. Upon exiting Moonsong Realm, the area of effect will continue to last for 12s, dealing 50% Physical DMG to enemies once every second.

liston.name: Liston
liston.4pc: Frostbound Zone inflicts enemies inside with the Frost Corrosion effect that lasts for 8s when dealing DMG. Triggering this effect again refreshes its duration. While in Burst Mode, each shot additionally grants 1 stack of Wounding; the maximum number of Wounding stacks increases to 24. When performing Ruinous Blizzard, the Base DMG increase effect granted by each Correcting Round increases to 10%.

heraclitus.name: Heraclitus
heraclitus.2pc: ATK increases by 5%, Fire DMG and Electroconvergence DMG increases by 5%.
heraclitus.4pc: The efficiency of acquiring Radiant Points increases by 100%. Damage multiplier of Signature Move – Auxiliary Precision Slash and Signature Move – Endless Eclipse doubles.

wilde.name: Wilde
wilde.2pc: Lightning DMG increases by 5%, Electroconvergence DMG increases by 10%.
wilde.4pc: During Electronic Blast state, ATK increases by 5%, Electroconvergence DMG increases by 10%.
